item.title: Rocket Landing using Reinforcement Learning!
item.description: â€œA crash is just a high-speed landing… in the wrong place.â€ â€“ Unknown RL Agent ğŸš€ Landing Rockets and Losing Our Minds: A Reinforcement Learning Journey By Harshavardhan Manohar & Nivedita Shainaj Nair ğŸ§ Prologue: It Started With a Rocket We wanted to land a rocket. Not in real life, of course, that wouldâ€™ve been wildly over budget for two grad students, but in a 2D simulation. Our project was supposed to be a “standard” application of reinforcement learning, something nice and contained.
